Summary: ufo high in the sky over south florida, daytime sighting.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Pompano Beach
There was one other sighting in Pompano Beach on or around February 2nd 2013
divs: sighting detailsit was 2 - 2- 2013 at around 3:15 pm,i was in my backyard, i looked up in the sky at an jet airliner flying west bound from hollywood\ ft. lauderdale airport when i noticed just up higher in the sky a shiny object, it looked like a shinning star, but it was daytime. so i went and got my nikon active 10- 22x50 binoculars and i got to see it clear, it was a silver shiny craft, it had like an energy field glowing around with red glow on top of what looked like a dome but the craft was saucer shaped. after observing for about 20 min a big cloud moved in so my vision was obstructed, when the cloud moved away the craft was gone. imidiatly after a gray twin prop engine plane started to fly in circles high up, it looked like a us navy plane but it had no markings anywhere, it flew circles for 45 min, then moved east toward the ocean and presided to fly in circles for 15 min , after flew south east....... this incident change my life, i now know for sure that we are not alone , the government knows about them .
